channel.title: [317] How do i change the login box in my client
channel.description: I have seen this question many times but none really answered. They say to go in cache and sprites (ive tried all this). Right now it is the original grey rectangle box, although when i look in sprites and all that crap its a brownish login box.... im yet to find the grey one it is using. The only other way i could think of to fixing this is to find the class.java (dont know which one maybe someone does?) i could change the name of the current one to one i have created instead of editing the current one. Also my client window is red on all the outside if anyone knows how to change the window that would help(im pretty sure you can't...) -Thanks

item.title: [317] How do i change the login box in my client
item.dc:creator: @bird1 bird_
item.description:
@bird1 wrote:

Get Tom’s cache editor (not spooning), open your client in it and go to media. Under one of the numbers should be the log in box.

Get the log in box of your choice and rename it to ‘0’. Then, import it. It should override the other box. Save you cache.

Then compile. Should work, as it worked for me :P.

Read full topic
